name: A Chess game about Life & Death
name_original: A Chess game about Life & Death
description:
How it fits the limitation : You must kill your units but also u must bring units to life using your lifes points

Players : 2 players for 1 computer

Controls (Mouse & Keybord) :

  • Escape : Unselect
  • Left Click : Select a Tile / Unit
  • Right Click : Move the camera
  • Scroll : Zoom

Rules : 

  • You loose 1 life point when moving a piece
  • The grid expands when there are too much pieces  (max size : 19 x 19)
  • Killing a unit gives life points (see on the trash can in the bottom left corner)
